entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is described as twirling his goatee around his finger to give it an extra curl.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is described as skulking, half-hidden, at the back of the group.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as being keenest to get her into the front of the frame.

entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is described as hurrying forward and dragging Harry into greater prominence.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being dragged by Rita Skeeter into greater prominence.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as not being at dinner, supposedly still in the hospital wing having her teeth fixed.

entities.name: photographer
entities.description: The photographer is described as keenest to get Fleur into the front of the frame.

relationships.description: Rita Skeeter dragged Harry into greater prominence.
The photographer seemed keenest to get Fleur at the front.
Rita Skeeter dragged Harry into greater prominence.
The photographer couldn’t stand far enough back to get Karkaroff into the frame.
